Contents 
  1. Description

Annotation Type AllowConcurrentEvents

@Retention(RUNTIME) @Target(METHOD) public @interface AllowConcurrentEvents
Marks an event subscriber method as being thread-safe. This annotation indicates that EventBus may invoke the event subscriber simultaneously from multiple threads.

This does not mark the method, and so should be used in combination with Subscribe.

Since:
10.0
Author:
Cliff Biffle
